channel.title: Video Hosting (user upload)
channel.description:
I was wanting to make a small video hosting section on my site, but I'm not entirely sure how to approach it. For one, i don't really know how the whole process goes other than after a user uploads a video file, the file goes through a server/converter and thereafter added to the site. Although I've never done this before, it doesn't mean I can't figure it out. I've come across a few things while looking all of it up, but I haven't gotten the idea of how to set it all up yet.
I'm hoping someone will give me a little help and guide me in the right direction with this. So any information such as hosting sites, downloads, etc., would help a lot.
Edit: Does anyone think this is a good way to go? - http://www.cirtexhosting.com/ffmpeg-hosting.shtml

item.title: Video Hosting (user upload)
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Get your users to upload it as a divx movie using some simple php script, then have a database with the links to the files in it, have a view page which incorporates the divx web player and use the database to find the file on your server.

Read full topic
